augmenter.label: Augmenter
augmenter.description: This indicates abilities from the augmenter class.

integrated.label: Integrated
integrated.description: Integrated items, also known as augmentations, are the ones which an Augmenter uses for their synergies.

augmenter.label: Augmenter
augmenter.description: This indicates abilities from the augmenter class.

synergy.label: Synergy
synergy.description: Actions with the synergy trait are combat techniques used by augmenters which require the use of their integrated items. If a synergy includes the activation of an item, that item must be an augmentation.

integrated.label: Integrated
integrated.description: Integrated items, also known as augmentations, are the ones which an Augmenter uses for their synergies.
